entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The "dotnet new mvc" template does not configure MapStaticAssets properly #59152
  • The split between desktop and dotnet msbuild in build.ps1 adds unnecessary complexity to the build #59151
  • Perf regression: https #59148
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, updates #59147
  • IStringLocalizer does not find resources if RootNamespace is set but not AssemblyName #59145
  • [FromHeader] behavior has been changed wiht no breaking change info #59139
  • Blazor Authenticate Exception_wasthrown #59137
  • Does Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client support AOT? #59133

Closed

  • Document that QuickGrid may render additional empty rows on the last page when using a paginator that should be appropriately styled #59096
    10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine WebSocketsOutOfProcessTests #59111
  • Preventing Default Behavior for Events Directive Lifecycle #59142
  • Static File Handling Issue in .NET 9 Blazor Server Template (MapStaticAssets) #59123
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #59122
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not firing in MainLayout #58958

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24573.1 #59134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix source build when using `--no-build-js` #59118
    area-blazor
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add option to exception handler middleware to not log error #59074
    area-networking
